lender.name: Patrick
lender.loan_because: I believe that this is a great program that gets money directly to people who are actively seeking to better themselves and their communities.

lender.name: Loran
lender.loan_because: I am a 45 year old woman in San Francisco- I started my business with a loan from friends- I am a botanist- I plant trees in parks and help save endangered species! I have been lucky with my business and I want to send some of my good luck to others so they can work hard and have a happy life!
lender.occupational_info: Biologist, Botanist, Habitat Restoration, Park Planning, Endangered Species management

lender.name: Rox
lender.loan_because: This loan is made in Jessica's name. Never loose hope; always have faith in your dreams. When you think your life is hard and you have nothing to give look again, it's amazing how little you need to give and it mean so much to others. Here with you to help you rebuild. “The future belongs to those who believe in the beauty of their dreams.” Eleanor Roosevelt

lender.name: Byron
lender.loan_because: I think its a great idea to erradicate poverty
lender.occupational_info: I help make software. In my spare time I fiddle with things that make noise and go fast. I also like to take pictures and play with my kids.

lender.name: bob
lender.loan_because: I think this model is fantastic. To make a difference with minimal effort and impact on my owm life, why doesn't everyone do this?
lender.occupational_info: I train computer professionals to program and administer databases and develop computer programs

lender.name: Nicolai
lender.loan_because: its super duper cool

lender.name: Catherine
lender.loan_because: I think kiva is a great way to give. The money helps people help themselves and you are connected to the process.

lender.name: Justin & Brenda

lender.loan_because: I enjoy helping others

lender.occupational_info: I am starting a nonprofit organization that educates and trains basic business, accounting and tax to economically-challenged women, small businesses & nonprofits.

lender.name: Kristi

lender.name: taxmOuth
lender.loan_because: Sometimes a hand up is better than a handout.
lender.occupational_info: I count money and help people make more of it.

lender.name: Kara
lender.loan_because: EVERY DAY my high school marketing teacher ended class saying, "MAKE A DIFFERENCE!" And I'm trying!!!

lender.name: David-Eric
lender.loan_because: I want to change world inequity
lender.occupational_info: I am a student who is pursuing multiple majors of study.

lender.name: Maureen
lender.loan_because: I am Grandma to Landon, Morgan, Carson, Braden, Madeline and Catherine and they are picking out the people they want to help as part of their Christmas present.

lender.name: Raumopol - Florian
lender.loan_because: Can't change the world without doing something, eh?!
lender.occupational_info: I work as a freelancer creating webpages for small businesses, providing webspace and care for their computers. I also sell vintage fashion magazines. Meanwhile I'm developing new business ideas everytime I have some time. If there is something out there worth thinking about just one second you can be sure I'm the one who will do that twice.

lender.name: Gail
lender.loan_because: We hope that by helping others to achieve self-reliance, they will be inspired to do the same for others in their communities.

lender.name: Laura
lender.loan_because: Wealth in the world should be equally distributed and businesss initiative ought to be encouraged to help communities to become self-sustainable.
lender.occupational_info: I work and volunteer in several charities around Oxfordshire and, at present, I am involved in several development projects in The Gambia. I have been contacting the banks in The Gambia and investigating the lack of loans throgh microfinance in the area,

lender.name: Liz
lender.loan_because: it's practical and makes immediate impact. Talk about self-efficacy....

lender.name: John and Natasha
lender.occupational_info: John writes computer software and Natasha teaches grade school.

lender.name: Stanley
lender.loan_because: none of them are BIG IDEAS that will change the world. but that's what's great. they're all SMALL IDEAS that will change THEIR world.
lender.occupational_info: www.linkedin.com/in/stanleystevens

lender.name: Joan
lender.loan_because: it feels good to give.

lender.name: Lisa
lender.loan_because: I can. To me, $50 is a couple nights out on the town with friends. To someone else, it could help to change their world.
lender.occupational_info: I'm a graduate of the B.Sc. Molecular Biology program University of Guelph, in Guelph, Ontario, Canada. I'm currently set to start a M.Sc. that will involve using molecular biology to measure diversity in world ecosystems.

lender.name: Chris and Ellie
lender.loan_because: We built (and exited) a successful business that could not have happened without a lot of support from a lot of people. This is a wonderful means of sharing with gratitude to people all over the globe.

lender.name: Martynn
lender.loan_because: I can
lender.occupational_info: I work for the Canadian federal government.

lender.name: Jeanne
lender.loan_because: it's the right thing to do. I wish I could do more to help people less fortunate.
lender.occupational_info: A retired nurse with 6 children and 8 gradnchildren, spending time with them in the remaining years of my life.

lender.name: Derek
lender.loan_because: I feel that i am blessed to have what my family has by the grace of God. I feel honoured to be able to help someone else who needs the funds to start a new business.
lender.occupational_info: I am a plumber. I repair and install anything to do with water and sewer systems.

lender.name: Robin
lender.loan_because: I believe in the power of the individual to overcome overwhelming odds if they have passion, a clear goal and the tools and infrastructure to get them started.
lender.occupational_info: I am an entrepreneur building an Internet company

lender.name: Keith
lender.loan_because: I believe in the microloan concept and favour no or very low interest lending. The less Government intervention to the transfer of credit the better as far as I am concerned. To many big hogs have their snouts in the trough in these poor countries.
lender.occupational_info: I am retired and actually think that our bank created credit system of finance must eventually collapse. The recent '07 - '08 crisis is a warning of that collapse. Our collective wealth(?) is all smoke and mirrors.

lender.name: Linda
lender.loan_because: I want to give a deserving person the opportunity to succeed just as someone gave me that opportunity. My travels have taken me to several countries where I have witnessed first-hand many who could use a little help. I am blessed and I want to give back. It's the right thing to do.
lender.occupational_info: I am an involved grandma, volunteer in my community and find it personally rewarding to do for others.

lender.name: Justine
lender.occupation: University student majoring in social work
lender.loan_because: I can!
lender.occupational_info: I am in university now majoring in social work and minoring in economics. I hope to work for organizations like Kiva in the future to remove poverty from our global society.

lender.name: Cindi
lender.loan_because: I can... :)
lender.occupational_info: I work in Water Treatment Plant and help produce safe drinking water for thousands of people.

lender.name: Crystal
lender.loan_because: I'm hopeful that a few $'s can make the world a better place.
lender.occupational_info: I work / lead projects that bring productivity, efficiency and revenue improvements to my employer, a major telecommunication services provider. My current focus is in the call centre field.

lender.name: Marc M
lender.loan_because: i can make a difference

lender.name: Liz
lender.loan_because: When I was trying to get my business started, there were wonderful people to help me - it is my pleasure to pass along those blessings to other small business owners.
lender.occupational_info: I work from my home by writing on my computer and using the Internet to arrange for paid advertising or free publicity for my clients. I seek to discover what is unique and special about each of my clients and then I share that information with others.

lender.name: Anne
lender.loan_because: I can!

lender.name: David
lender.loan_because: It helps someone get started and become independent
lender.occupational_info: plastic injection molding

lender.name: Ronald
lender.loan_because: it's an opportunity to help someone better their lives and their community.
lender.occupational_info: I provide clerical support to the Police Department of a large city.

lender.name: Brandi
lender.loan_because: I have always wanted to give back, but was leery of not for profits and could never ensure that I would truly be making a difference. Kiva.org shows me exactly where my money is going and I can see that I have a direct impact on someone's life.

lender.name: Shinaaz
lender.loan_because: I believe we all need someone to help us in the beginning and it amazes me how little we need to accomplish our dream and make our lives more fulfilled.
lender.occupational_info: I work with my husband. We own a production company.

lender.name: Pamela and Michael
lender.loan_because: it such a great way to help others.

lender.name: In memory Courtney (LS)
lender.loan_because: YES WE CAN! YES WE WILL!

lender.occupational_info: We take wood chips and sawdust from logs that have been made into lumber and make paper.

lender.loan_because: I want to help make a difference in someones life
lender.occupational_info: I am very active in Human and Civil Rights. I am a co-founder and currently serve as Co-Chairman of the Gloucester County New Jersey Human Relations Commission

lender.name: Amy
lender.loan_because: I can

lender.name: Carol

lender.name: Natalie & Caitlin
lender.loan_because: everyone deserves a chance to improve their life.

lender.name: Andres & Lindsay
lender.loan_because: collective small differences add up

lender.name: jean
lender.loan_because: I love to see people who are striving to better themselves and their communities. Those strangers can inspire us on an every day basis.....

lender.name: Ryan & Tiffani
lender.loan_because: I had dreamed of making a ton of money and someday being a micro-finance philanthropist funding it myself...dreamed about it years ago before I even had heard of MicroFinance. This is a wonderful opportunity!

lender.occupational_info: We participate in other international projects, such as fighting polio, promoting clean water, and donating medical supplies in needy geographies.

lender.name: Susan

lender.loan_because: i believe we all need help at some point and those of us that are blessed are so to be a blessing to others.
lender.occupational_info: I use business analysis and software to help companies maximize customer information to grow their businesses in revenue, profits, customer retention, and customer satisfaction.

lender.occupational_info: build homes one at a time.

lender.occupational_info: I get to meet interesting people.

lender.name: Steve and Shelley
lender.occupation: Aero space engineer and real estate broker
lender.loan_because: We enjoy the success of others. If we can be a small part of helping that to happen for someone, then what a blessing. Also, we want our grandchildren to know that part of being successful is helping others be successful.
lender.occupational_info: Steve is an aero space engineer who works for Nasa. Currently he is working on a mission to Jupiter. Shelley is a real estate broker and real estate investor. She travels around the country giving seminars on "How to Get Started in Investing" and offers a Women Investment Network program.

lender.name: Gustavo
lender.occupation: Owner of a Information Technology Company

lender.name: Nadja
lender.loan_because: I love the Idea of helping inviduals who are trying to help themselves despite their economic or social challenges or disadvantages.

lender.name: Ben (left) and Abbey
lender.loan_because:
my master desires to:
be Creative be Loving be Kind be Beautiful be Expanding be Abundant be Receptive

lender.name: Ramin
lender.loan_because: With how our world 'leaders' and institutions are running things, I think it is time to take matters more into our own hands to try to create the world we all know is possible!
lender.occupational_info: I teach international students English as a second language in the US and abroad. I try to teach how communication, expression and interaction are vital to being a more complete and real human being.

lender.name: Susan
lender.loan_because: These loans have a ripple effects in their communities. They raise expectations because people see their neighbors succeeding.

lender.name: Greg
lender.loan_because: It makes sense.

lender.name: Rudy
lender.loan_because: I work in pharmaceutical distribution and previously worked for a non-profit credit union. I believe the opportunities provided by KIVA and the field partners is real and miraculous. Also, it is gratifying to see my donation at work.
lender.occupational_info: I work to help independent pharmacies compete with chain pharmacies through increased negotiation on their behalf with insurance companies and assistance with contracting issues.

lender.name: Azizi Jennis
lender.loan_because: I want to make a difference

lender.name: Diane
lender.loan_because: If I can help even one person it makes it all worthwhile.

lender.name: jamillah
lender.loan_because: I wanted to help out!
lender.occupational_info: I'm an actor. Sometimes I'm on television.

lender.name: Duane and Frieda
lender.loan_because: this is our chance to help someone to help themselves and their loved ones. We have been blessed and want to share our good fortune.

lender.name: Lissa
lender.loan_because: I want to help people around the world better themselves with a hand up, not a hand out. This will enable them to provide a better life for themselves, their families, and for their community.
lender.occupational_info: Through our research efforts on the eye, we are learning about sight-threatening eye disease and how to improve the clinical treatment to prevent blindness

lender.name: Jason
lender.loan_because: a relatively small amount of money for someone luckily born in a rich part of the world can make such a big difference.
lender.occupational_info: I help a company expand its business.

lender.name: Mitch & Susan
lender.loan_because: There is such satisfaction from working hard because you are responsible for your own life and what you make of it. We understand others need just a little in order to accomplish the same in their own lives. When others work hard and are responsible, our satisfaction comes from that.
lender.occupational_info: Making wise investments helps us to have extra in our lives and we want the people we lend money to share with others in need.

lender.name: cris
lender.loan_because: it's time for me to share
lender.occupational_info: I work for a major telecom company

lender.name: RIck
lender.loan_because: To help motivated humans make the difference they have wanted to all along!
lender.occupational_info: Helping humans realize their ambitions

lender.name: Eric Wilson
lender.loan_because: I can have a real impact on the life of another human - without politics and bureaucracy getting in the way. How refreshing.
lender.occupational_info: I am a serial entrepreneur in the computer software industry.

lender.name: Vyktur
lender.loan_because: I've always wanted to, and then I found Kiva. It's the right thing to do if you believe in the economic theory.
lender.occupational_info: I'm a full-time computer programmer and a part-time Christian campus minister (full-time Christian, part-time minister ^.^)

lender.loan_because: I can.

lender.occupational_info: Consulting and project management. Helping others achieving goals

lender.name: Alejandro
lender.loan_because: I can't think of a better cause than helping others build a better life for themselves and their families.

lender.name: nicholas

lender.name: Sergio
lender.loan_because: I like to help make positive change inn the world. Helping others become independent and successful is something I find deeply rewarding.
lender.occupational_info: I try to keep busy helping others find work and hire others to work for me and compensate them for work well done. We work together and are very successful at compleating contracts in construction, roofing, landscaping, and other nonskilled labor work. I find the work and keep work coming in and organize a team of workers to complete the job assignments.

lender.name: nadia
lender.loan_because: I believe that people have the responsibility to support humanity whenever possible, especially women of color in developing nations.
lender.occupational_info: I am Ph D candidate in the department of political science at Rutgers University. I study representation and secondary marginalized groups - specifically in the Black and feminist communities.

lender.name: In Memory of Keith Yap
lender.loan_because:
Keith's gift to the world was his generosity of spirit, caring nature and kindness to all those he crossed paths with.
By helping others in this way may Keith's legacy live on.

lender.name: Marco Vidal
lender.loan_because: It seems a nice online project.

lender.name: Howard
lender.loan_because: I want to empower entrepreneurs in the developing world to lift themselves out of poverty.
lender.occupational_info: I am in the business of selling personal care, home care, remedies and organic flavorings, and sharing the business opportunity with others.

lender.name: Hugh
lender.loan_because: I think it is important to help serious individuals to be able to help themselves and, in doing so, to help others in society.
lender.occupational_info: I am retired Public Servant from Trinidad and Tobago. I carry on a small, home-based retail business in consumer goods.

lender.name: Molly
lender.loan_because: One world, one people. I believe that we need to help each other. If everyone did, I think the world would be a much happier, and peaceful, place!
lender.occupational_info: managing 4 kids, of all ages!

lender.name: Robert
lender.loan_because: it's what I do.

lender.name: Heather
lender.loan_because: Simply put - I love people... We should help each other as much possible, and as long as I am able I will. Our obligation to our fellow man extends worldwide, not just to the borders of our country of birth.
lender.occupational_info: Platform of services for the advancement of real estate agents.

lender.name: Bindu
lender.loan_because: I've seen first hand how microloans can change lives..
lender.occupational_info: I am a grant writer for an early education non-profit

lender.name: D&S Fancy
lender.loan_because: We have been very fortunate in life and we want to help improve the lives of others.
lender.occupational_info: My husband is a kitchen designer and I am a laboratory technician.

lender.name: Delio
lender.loan_because: I not have large resources but I prefer not going out one night to fun and try to help those who most need

lender.name: Karen
lender.loan_because: I know how educational and rewarding starting and operating one's own company can be.
lender.occupational_info: I provide interior design services to companies, healthcare facilities and homeowners. My current LEED accreditation enables me to integrate sustainable design processes and products into my projects for healthier and more productive interior environments.

lender.name: Lisa
lender.loan_because: It's an easy way to make a real difference in someone's life.

lender.name: Adam
lender.loan_because: My father is from Afghanistan and I am proud of that.It is our duty to not horde wealth but rather share it with our brothers whether they be Afghan,African,or American.Nations should not divide us,we are all human beings of this planet. Now,ill get off my mini-soapbox.
lender.occupational_info: I am a student and a member of the US Army

lender.name: Andrew Hollister
lender.loan_because: I loan because can

lender.name: Cátia
lender.loan_because: I believe I can make a difference with what I have, no matter how small it is.

lender.name: Lakeview Academy
lender.loan_because: We want to help those who long to escape a life of poverty and improve conditions in their community.
lender.occupational_info: In addition to voicing the ideas and concerns of the Middle School students, our student council raises funds by selling healthy snacks during our break period. We are happy to be able to donate these funds to a number of charitable organizations.

lender.name: Jesse
lender.loan_because: Kiva allows one person to perform the actions of the IMF/World Bank for one or many others in a more humane, realistic and reasonable way. Knowing that I can help fund someone's business that could allow them to send their first family member to school, provide a constant income, and contribute to the economic growth and stability of an entire community.
lender.occupational_info: I create and build internet web sites for business's.

lender.name: Bob and Laurie
lender.loan_because: It's a nice feeling to donate a small amount of money and see it make a huge difference in other's lives.

lender.name: gabriela
lender.loan_because: I belive in the butterfly effect. A small effort can make a huge impact... I hope...

lender.name: Cortney Ryan Smith
lender.loan_because: I care. And entrepreneurs rock!
lender.occupational_info: I make sure the numbers are correct.

lender.name: William
lender.loan_because: Those to whom much is given much is required
lender.occupational_info: Waking students up to their global responsibilities

lender.name: Emily and Derek
lender.occupation: Real Estate Sales Agent and Music Minister
lender.loan_because: God has blessed us in many ways and we would like to pay it forward to as many as we can.

lender.name: Danee
lender.loan_because: we love to help other people and we have always appreciated how much others have helped us! Its our turn to give back!
lender.occupational_info: We are the Transitions Program at our High School. Our main idea of our program is respect, giving, and hard work. We work not only in our school but also out in the community.

lender.name: Core 11 Seton Hall
lender.loan_because: We saved for a week on unnecessary luxuries (lattes, snacks, nails, parties) and made a loan.
lender.occupational_info:
Freshmen College Students of Dr. Beneteau's Core 1101 (The Big Questions) class at Seton Hall University -- class of 2011. Mostly Political Science majors.
PROFESSOR'S NOTE: I'm proud of you guys!

lender.name: Holly
lender.loan_because: I want to help people make a difference in their lives.

lender.name: Craig M.
lender.loan_because: it feels good to participate in helping.

lender.name: Christopher
lender.loan_because: I consider myself extremely fortunate and truly blessed. Although I am not a wealthy individual, I do look for ways to help whenever and however possible. Hopefully my participation in Kiva will help empower people around the globe to be all that they can be. Further, the Kiva organization is nothing short of terrific as it helps identify those most in need. In addition, when reading some of the other lender's profiles, I feel honored to be among them! Anyone wishing to correspond, feel free to email me at "cturner25@triad.rr.com."
lender.occupational_info: As the Director for Research Administration in the Department of Pharmacology at UNC-CH, I work as a member of a highly trained team to effectively manage federal, state and private sponsored research programs. The department's primary mission is 1) to educate and train scientists and physicians in the discipline of pharmacology for the challenges of today and tomorrow, 2) to make discoveries in research that are relevant to medicine and the basic mechanisms underlying the causes of human disease, 3) to work with other scientists and physicians in an interdisciplinary approach to translate basic discovery into new treatments and cures of human disease.

lender.name: Kelli
lender.loan_because: I liked the idea of giving support to people who are working hard and trying to improve their lives.
lender.occupational_info: I keep track of where the money goes in a business.

lender.name: Patricia
lender.loan_because: I am blessed with so much. In America, I hear of many millions of people less fortunate and in great need, and I want to help, but do not know how. There are many organizations that profess to help the poor, but much of the money is used up in administrative or other costs and does not reach the people in need. Kiva seems like a way to help those in need more directly with more of the money, and in a way that is self sustaining.

lender.name: BART & DYLAN
lender.loan_because: I HAVE STRUGGLED IN THE PAST AND NOW I AM IN A BETTER PLACE.
lender.occupational_info: I INSTALL PIPE TO PROVIDE WATER AND WASTE SYSTEMS FOR COMMERCIAL BUSINESSES

lender.name: suZen
lender.loan_because: I can.
lender.occupational_info: Art director - website design.

lender.name: Mamie
lender.loan_because: I like the thought that my little loan can make a big difference in someone's life.

lender.name: Joao Vaz
lender.loan_because: I believe people will do their best with my money.
lender.occupational_info: Environmental consultancy at ecoGestus Lda

lender.name: Liane
lender.loan_because: So little money can make such a significant impact on the lives of those making the request, and their families. It's a no brainer.

lender.name: Vinny
lender.loan_because: It's a way to pay forward all the help that I have received in my life.
lender.occupational_info: I use machines and hand tools to repair jet engine parts.

lender.name: Terry
lender.loan_because: everyone needs the chance to succeed. We all have goals and I have accomplished some of mine and now can aid others in the pursuit of theirs.
lender.occupational_info: I oversee operations of shipping in and shipping out product.

lender.name: Antoinette
lender.loan_because: I enjoy helping others pursue their entreprenurial dreams.
lender.occupational_info: I manage software implementations for a Fortune 500 company in the risk management industry.

lender.name: Kara
lender.loan_because: I want to make a difference in people's lives around the world.

lender.name: Jennifer
lender.loan_because: giving back is what really matters.
lender.occupational_info: Advanced practice nurse specializing in cardiology/congestive heart failure

lender.name: Gladys
lender.loan_because: I want to give a litle help to parents and children in very much need.

lender.name: Sven
lender.loan_because: I like to help people to help themselves to a better life.
lender.occupational_info: I have had my own import business, importing different machinery to Norway. Now I am retired.

lender.name: Josh
lender.loan_because: I like doing things that help others become self-sufficient.
lender.occupational_info: My company helps doctors more easily educate and communicate with their patients using the Internet

lender.name: Bonnie
lender.loan_because: Because it is past time for the people on earth to come together. We must learn to accept our differences and live in peace.
lender.occupational_info: I am the President of a Local Labor Union fighting to maintain the middle class in America. If we lose the middle we will be reduced to the very rich and the very poor which in turn would have a negative effect on the world's economy.

lender.name: Chris
lender.loan_because: I'm lucky enough to have the kind of lifestyle where I can help others.

lender.name: Alice
lender.loan_because: I want to help people and make a difference in the world.
lender.occupational_info: I make costumes for opera singers.

lender.name: Abdullah
lender.loan_because: the more opportunities for prosperity we facilitate to others, the better world we all live in.
lender.occupational_info: I work for a multilateral institution that invests in private sector enterprises in developing countries.

lender.name: Nellie
lender.loan_because: I like to support people that want to help themselves.

lender.name: Debbie & Vince
lender.loan_because: It's good to give back when your fortunate!
lender.occupational_info: Debbie helps people get in shape by lifting weights. Vince performs all types of construction work on buildings and private homes.

lender.name: The White Aisle
lender.loan_because: I am lucky enough to be able to.
lender.occupational_info: Graphic designer

lender.name: Kelly
lender.loan_because: I have been gifted with many blessings in my life. I'd like to help others have the same opportunities.
lender.occupational_info: I publish information on the Internet.

lender.name: Chris Buckley
lender.loan_because: It is a concrete way to build economic stability, defend the dignity of every human person and promote the common good.
lender.occupational_info: I research the media, to understand how companies and organizations can tell better stories about themselves and the good work they do in the world.

lender.name: Carol
lender.loan_because: I want to contribute to someone who is willing to advance themselves and their community. It is satisfying to people succeed.
lender.occupational_info: I am one of three people in our office, so I do all the accounting, most of the letter writing, and generally keep the office of the day care running smoothly.

lender.name: Christel
lender.loan_because: to be able to empower women in a challenged position

lender.name: Mark
lender.loan_because: we have too much not to share.
lender.occupational_info: I help make a company Web site.

lender.name: Diana
lender.loan_because: because I am able and it is a wonderful opportunity to help someone
lender.occupational_info: I make fused glass jewelry and wall art by cutting the glass, designing and then firing it in a kiln

lender.name: toni
lender.loan_because: I want to be a positive role model for my daughter by showing her that compassion and caring can go a long way.

lender.name: Tiago
lender.occupational_info: Working in malaria drug resistance

lender.name: Ann
lender.loan_because: I want to make a difference.

lender.name: jodi
lender.loan_because: I believe this is an excellent way to help someone declare their independence.

lender.name: Sally
lender.loan_because: I believe in giving back.
lender.occupational_info: I work for people who have a lot of money to invest (I'm not one of them), and my job is to make sure their investments are as safe and risk-free as they can be.

lender.name: Bill
lender.loan_because: These people need so little to be very successful, productive and hard-working

lender.name: Susan
lender.loan_because: I believe that giving charity without empowerment merely disables those less fortunate than I am, fostering dependence and maintaining an unnecessary, unGodly distance between people .
lender.occupational_info: I help people improve their written communication skills, and create moving words for my own readers.

lender.name: Alice
lender.loan_because: I can!

lender.name: John & Tina
lender.loan_because: Because Kiva loans fortify the vision that the world is truly a single community and family.

lender.name: Dick & Jackie
lender.loan_because: To help people
lender.occupational_info: My wife and I are retired and enjoy genealogy, birding and travel.

lender.name: Edward
lender.loan_because: it is the right thing to do.
lender.occupational_info: I help run a medical device(respiratory care) manufacturing company during the day. I take care of my kids and play guitar/piano at night.

lender.name: joao
lender.loan_because: I like to see honest hard working people flourish. If they need financial support to upgrade or to start their business it is my pleasure to help them.
lender.occupational_info: I fly commercial jet airplanes carrying passengers from one location to another. I provide transportation for people to reach the place they need to go in less time and in a comfortable manner.

lender.name: Owen
lender.loan_because: It is something I want to do to help and think it is important to do.
lender.occupational_info: I am a fourth grade student in the United States. My Mom is from Chicago, IL and my Dad grew up in Indonesia.

lender.name: Gisela
lender.loan_because: I care
lender.occupational_info: research in international economics

lender.name: Faith
lender.loan_because: It is such a great way to have a direct impact.
lender.occupational_info: I help people cope with the stress filled times they encounter in their life.

lender.name: Alexandra
lender.loan_because: I have been fortunate to have many wonderful people lend me a hand as I've made my way through school and started my career. I am lending in honor of all the generous people who have touched my life.

lender.name: Klaas
lender.loan_because: cheap credit is the best remedy against poverty.
lender.occupational_info: Software Engineer

lender.name: Berber
lender.loan_because: I was lucky to be born in the Netherlands. I had the opportunity to take a good education and get a job I enjoy doing. I know I can't change everything that is wrong in this world, but I can make an effort to do what I can.
lender.occupational_info: I work for a bank.

lender.name: Annette
lender.loan_because: I believe in empowering others to do what they enjoy.
lender.occupational_info: My hobby, free time and most of my money is spent on photography, which I love. I enjoy the manual processes of using film and developing in the darkroom, as well as digital photography and computer-assisted editing.

lender.name: Cary
lender.loan_because: I want to see others succeed!
lender.occupational_info: My husband and I started and now run a successful construction company.

lender.name: Sheryl
lender.loan_because: God has blessed my life and I believe I am called to give.
lender.occupational_info: I help small and medium sized companies export their products to international markets.

lender.name: Thomas
lender.loan_because: we are called to think about more than just ourselves.
lender.occupational_info: Finance

lender.name: Blake
lender.loan_because: A lot of people don't like Americans, but, if you give those people money, their feelings usually change.
lender.occupational_info: Just keeping it real, which translates in all languages.

lender.name: Tanya
lender.loan_because: I feel blessed to have a good job and a healthy family and I like to share my good fortune with others.

lender.name: Karen,Dave & Amellia
lender.loan_because: It's a wonderful way to help someone!
lender.occupational_info: I work with families who want to adopt or foster children in need.

lender.name: Jessica
lender.loan_because: I feel it is important to give back. I am very blessed - I have an amazing family and truly great friends. I also feel that self reliance is so important. If I can be contribute to someone's independence than I feel its been a great day.

lender.name: Ken
lender.loan_because: Helping others is a deep passion within.
lender.occupational_info: I work in sales finding new clients for a catering and event planning company. We provide breakfast, lunch and dinner to business. We create parties for clients ranging between 20 guests to 25,000 guests.

lender.name: Marguerite
lender.loan_because: I think it's a great idea
lender.occupational_info: Process payments and invoices from Customers/Vendors.

lender.name: Diana
lender.loan_because: I live part-time in Guatemala, and I see the impact even small amounts of money (by U.S. middle-class standards) can have on individual lives. The Kiva microloans connect me to others in the world in a meaningful way. It's the heart in action!
lender.occupational_info: I have been an arts and entertainment journalist and a TV-documentary producer; I am currently at work on an experimental novel. And in my business as The wordARTist, I use my writing and editing skills to build powerful word-bridges connecting artists to their audiences--anywhere in the world.

lender.name: Rachel and Bruce
lender.occupation: owners of small, rural animal hospital
lender.loan_because: We, every one of us, can create the kind of world in which we want to live. We choose to give until there is no need...

lender.name: Janice
lender.loan_because: It's the right thing to do.
lender.occupational_info: I volunteer at the local hospital and I am a breast cancer survivor.

lender.name: Henrique & Family
lender.loan_because: I should and it's a better way to help
lender.occupational_info: I design usable IT systems, I design productive and human work environments and structures and I help organisations with strategic thinking and innovative development

lender.name: Jim
lender.loan_because: I'm interested in the effects of microlending
lender.occupational_info: Serial entrepeneur

lender.name: Lauren
lender.loan_because: I want to do my part to decrease the North-South gap.

lender.name: Katie
lender.loan_because: Money is energy. What goes around comes around.
lender.occupational_info: I am currently teaching English to elementary-middle school students in South Korea.

lender.name: Alex
lender.loan_because: I have been fortunate enough to have the things I desire in life and now I am able to give back and help others do the same.

lender.name: Preeti
lender.loan_because: we must work together to make the world a better place.

lender.name: Matthew
lender.loan_because: I feel blessed by all the opportunities my education has allowed me, and want to help others get off the ground .
lender.occupational_info: I work with club sport athletes at a university in a recreation center.

lender.name: Dave
lender.loan_because: Lear: You see how this world goes? Gloucester: I see it feelingly.
lender.occupational_info: Taught writing, literature and photography for 35 years.

lender.name: Tim & Susan
lender.loan_because: We are so blessed and there is so much need throughout the world.

lender.name: Natalie
lender.loan_because: every small amount counts..

lender.name: Chris
lender.loan_because: it's good to help others. Simple as that.
lender.occupational_info:
I am a graphic designer for a large company.
I also perform stand up comedy at night for fun.

lender.name: Lending Hands
lender.occupation: Group of Concerned Friends in Tallahassee, FL
lender.loan_because: as a group, we want to help others in need. Lending also joins us in friendship and spirit. We felt we could do more together than individually.
lender.occupational_info: We are a group of friends who met through church and work. We mostly are in helping professions.

lender.name: Helene
lender.loan_because: In our family, we believe in helping others help themselves. My children have chosen the busineses to which they want to make loans, and they have contributed their own money towards that end.
lender.occupational_info: I am a medical social worker who helps patients and their families cope with illnesses while in the hospital.

lender.name: Jennifer
lender.loan_because: It sure would be a warm fuzzy to know someone else may receive something that will change their life for the better forever. No one person should have to struggle just to survive.
lender.occupational_info: I represent Celebrity Talent.

lender.name: English Class
lender.loan_because: We have much and want to share with others.
lender.occupational_info: Unique and Plentiful... we are students working toward Bachelor Degrees in various subjects!

lender.name: Stephanie en Rutger
lender.loan_because: to be independent and selfsufficient
lender.occupational_info: out of the heart

lender.name: the Borneman Family
lender.loan_because: To show our kids how simple it can be to touch someone's life.
lender.occupational_info: I am the mother of two boys ages 8 and 9.

lender.name: Nelson
lender.loan_because: Let´s change the world :)

lender.name: Margaret
lender.loan_because: I think the best way to combat poverty is to supply people with the tools and resources they need to help themselves. These loans help people become self-sufficient, and I think that is a priceless gift.
lender.occupational_info: i am a full time student

lender.name: william
lender.loan_because: Relatively small loans can be literally life changing for an extraordinary number of people. How cool is that? Go, KIVA Go!
lender.occupational_info: My company installs exterior storm shutters to protect people's homes in the event of hurricanes and other storms.

lender.name: Katie
lender.loan_because: I have been blessed with financial stability in my own life and I hope to spread this good fortune to as many people as I can in my lifetime.
lender.occupational_info: I am studing international development and business.

lender.name: Sue
lender.loan_because: by doing this small thing, I can be part of a big positive change.

lender.name: Bob
lender.loan_because: everyone deserves a chance in life. As a community, we must help each other to become better people and enrich our lives.
lender.occupational_info: I work as an engineer in building airplanes for The Boeing company.

lender.name: Meghan
lender.loan_because: Because everything is better when it's shared.

lender.name: Sanderson Family
lender.loan_because: We have been blessed with a caring family and want to share our good fortune with others.
lender.occupational_info: Our farm grows corn, wheat, soybeans and sunflowers. We all have various careers.

lender.name: Julianne
lender.occupational_info: I am learning how to create solutions to problems through making objects, systems or services.
